title.zh: 餐桌之外：當季蔬果永續飲食計畫
title.en: Beyond the Table: Seasonal Produce Sustainable Diet Plan

summary.zh: 從市場到餐桌，重新理解食物旅程與永續選擇。
summary.en: From market to table, rethinking the food journey and sustainable choices.

title.zh: 智慧城市：永續交通解決方案

summary.zh: 運用科技優化城市交通，減少碳排放，打造宜居環境。
summary.en: Using technology to optimize urban transportation, reduce carbon emissions, and create livable environments.

title.zh: 數位包容：縮小城鄉教育差距
title.en: Digital Inclusion: Bridging Urban-Rural Education Gap

summary.zh: 透過數位工具讓偏鄉學童也能享有優質教育資源。
summary.en: Enabling quality educational resources for rural students through digital tools.

title.zh: 循環經濟：廢棄物轉化再生計畫

summary.zh: 將廢棄物轉化為資源，實踐循環經濟理念。
summary.en: Transforming waste into resources, practicing circular economy principles.

title.zh: 永續社區：在地行動與全球視野
title.en: Sustainable Community: Local Action, Global Vision

summary.zh: 從社區出發，連結全球永續發展目標，展現在地行動力。
summary.en: Starting from the community, connecting to global SDGs, demonstrating local action.
